ABOUT.TITLE: About me
ABOUT.DESCRIPTION: Hi, I am a frontend developer based in Taunusstein, Germany, with a passion for creating intuitive and responsive web applications.
ABOUT.INFO: My journey into frontend development began out of a fascination with how websites work behind the scenes. I quickly fell in love with the blend of creativity and logic involved in building user interfaces. Every project is an opportunity for me to push my skills further and create seamless, engaging experiences for users. I love staying on the cutting edge of frontend technologies to bring fresh ideas to my work. I have a flexible mindset and am always eager to tackle new challenges that help me grow my skills and deepen my understanding.
ABOUT.SPECIALIZATION: I specialize in different frontend technologies and I love bringing designs to life with clean, efficient code. I enjoy solving complex problems and constantly learning new technologies to improve user experiences.
ABOUT.SKILLS: I have gained valuable experience in building projects using various front-end technologies and concepts. From crafting responsive user interfaces to optimizing performance, I am constantly improving my abilities to stay at the forefront of the industry. My journey does not stop there — I am always looking for new ways to expand my knowledge and take on new challenges. Recently, I have started exploring ethical hacking to better understand web security and to enhance the robustness of the applications I build. Continuous learning is key to my approach, and I am excited about where it will take me next.
ABOUT.CONTACT_MESSAGE: Please feel free to contact me. I am always eager to continue expanding my knowledge and am passionate about learning new technologies and concepts.

comments.miriam_ina_message: When I worked with Miriam as a web developer, I was impressed by her determination and motivation. Through her valuable ideas and productive discussions, we were able to find the best way to implement our web application together. Thanks to her strong will and persistence, she was able to successfully overcome any challenge.
comments.miriam_manuel_message: Working with Miriam was very pleasant from the start. She impresses with her professionalism, solution-oriented thinking, and reliable way of working. With her open and friendly nature, she contributes significantly to positive team dynamics.

CONTACT.TITLE: Contact
CONTACT.HEADER:
Got a frontend challenge?
Let's build a solution!
CONTACT.DESCRIPTION: Contact me via this form! I am eager to learn about your ideas and contribute my skills to help bring your projects to life.
CONTACT.PRIVACY_POLICY: I have read the Privacy Policy and agree to it.

PORTFOLIO.HEADER: Explore a selection of my work here – interact with projects to see my skills in action.
PORTFOLIO.JOIN: Task manager inspired by the Kanban System. Create and organize tasks using drag and drop functions, assign users and categories.
PORTFOLIO.POLLO: A Jump ’n’ Run game based on an object-oriented approach. Help Pepe to find coins and salsa bottles to fight against the chickens.
PORTFOLIO.CRM: A very simple Customer Relationship Management system working with CRUD functionality.
PORTFOLIO.POKEMON: Based on the PokéAPI, a simple library that provides and catalogues Pokémon information.

PRIVACY_POLICY.TITLE: Privacy Policy
PRIVACY_POLICY.DESCRIPTION_1: This Privacy Policy describes Our policies and procedures on the collection, use and disclosure of Your information when You use the Service and tells You about Your privacy rights and how the law protects You.
PRIVACY_POLICY.DESCRIPTION_2: We use Your Personal data to provide and improve the Service. By using the Service, You agree to the collection and use of information in accordance with this Privacy Policy. This Privacy Policy has been created with the help of the

INTERPRETATION_DEFINITIONS.TITLE: Interpretation and Definitions
INTERPRETATION_DEFINITIONS.INTERPRETATION_TEXT: The words of which the initial letter is capitalized have meanings defined under the following conditions. The following definitions shall have the same meaning regardless of whether they appear in singular or in plural.
INTERPRETATION_DEFINITIONS.DEFINITIONS_INTRO: For the purposes of this Privacy Policy:

DEFINITIONS.ACCOUNT: Account means a unique account created for You to access our Service or parts of our Service.
DEFINITIONS.AFFILIATE: Affiliate means an entity that controls, is controlled by or is under common control with a party, where "control" means ownership of 50% or more of the shares, equity interest or other securities entitled to vote for election of directors or other managing authority.
DEFINITIONS.COMPANY: Company (referred to as either "the Company", "We", "Us" or "Our" in this Agreement) refers to Pollo loco.
DEFINITIONS.COOKIES: Cookies are small files that are placed on Your computer, mobile device or any other device by a website, containing the details of Your browsing history on that website among its many uses.
DEFINITIONS.DEVICE: Device means any device that can access the Service such as a computer, a cellphone or a digital tablet.
DEFINITIONS.PERSONAL_DATA: Personal Data is any information that relates to an identified or identifiable individual.
DEFINITIONS.SERVICE_PROVIDER: Service Provider means any natural or legal person who processes the data on behalf of the Company. It refers to third-party companies or individuals employed by the Company to facilitate the Service, to provide the Service on behalf of the Company, to perform services related to the Service or to assist the Company in analyzing how the Service is used.
DEFINITIONS.USAGE_DATA: Usage Data refers to data collected automatically, either generated by the use of the Service or from the Service infrastructure itself (for example, the duration of a page visit).
DEFINITIONS.WEBSITE: Website refers to Pollo loco, accessible from
DEFINITIONS.YOU: You means the individual accessing or using the Service, or the company, or other legal entity on behalf of which such individual is accessing or using the Service, as applicable.

COLLECTING_USING_DATA.TITLE: Collecting and Using Your Personal Data

PERSONAL_DATA.TITLE: Personal Data
PERSONAL_DATA.DESCRIPTION: While using Our Service, We may ask You to provide Us with certain personally identifiable information that can be used to contact or identify You. Personally identifiable information may include, but is not limited to:
LIST: Address, State, Province, ZIP/Postal code, City

USAGE_DATA.TITLE: Usage Data
USAGE_DATA.DESCRIPTION_1: Usage Data is collected automatically when using the Service.
USAGE_DATA.DESCRIPTION_2: Usage Data may include information such as Your Device's Internet Protocol address (e.g. IP address), browser type, browser version, the pages of our Service that You visit, the time and date of Your visit, the time spent on those pages, unique device identifiers and other diagnostic data.
USAGE_DATA.DESCRIPTION_3: When You access the Service by or through a mobile device, We may collect certain information automatically, including, but not limited to, the type of mobile device You use, Your mobile device unique ID, the IP address of Your mobile device, Your mobile operating system, the type of mobile Internet browser You use, unique device identifiers and other diagnostic data.
USAGE_DATA.DESCRIPTION_4: We may also collect information that Your browser sends whenever You visit our Service or when You access the Service by or through a mobile device.

TRACKING_COOKIES.TITLE: Tracking Technologies and Cookies
TRACKING_COOKIES.DESCRIPTION: We use Cookies and similar tracking technologies to track the activity on Our Service and store certain information. Tracking technologies used are beacons, tags, and scripts to collect and track information and to improve and analyze Our Service. The technologies We use may include:

LIST.TITLE: Cookies or Browser Cookies
LIST.DESCRIPTION: A cookie is a small file placed on Your Device. You can instruct Your browser to refuse all Cookies or to indicate when a Cookie is being sent. However, if You do not accept Cookies, You may not be able to use some parts of our Service. Unless you have adjusted Your browser setting so that it will refuse Cookies, our Service may use Cookies.

LIST.TITLE: Web Beacons
LIST.DESCRIPTION: Certain sections of our Service and our emails may contain small electronic files known as web beacons (also referred to as clear gifs, pixel tags, and single-pixel gifs) that permit the Company to count users who have visited those pages or opened an email and for other related website statistics.

USE.TITLE: Use of Your Personal Data
USE.INTRO: The Company may use Personal Data for the following purposes:
PURPOSES: To provide and maintain our Service
For the performance of a contract
To provide You with news, special offers and general information

RETENTION.TITLE: Retention of Your Personal Data
RETENTION.DESCRIPTION: The Company will retain Your Personal Data only for as long as is necessary for the purposes set out in this Privacy Policy.

TRANSFER.TITLE: Transfer of Your Personal Data
TRANSFER.DESCRIPTION: Your information, including Personal Data, is processed at the Company's operating offices and may be transferred to and maintained on servers located outside of Your jurisdiction.

DELETE.TITLE: Delete Your Personal Data
DELETE.DESCRIPTION: You have the right to delete or request assistance in deleting the Personal Data we have collected.

BUSINESS_TRANSACTIONS.TITLE: Business Transactions
BUSINESS_TRANSACTIONS.DESCRIPTION: We may disclose Your Personal Data in the event of a business transaction such as a merger, acquisition, or asset sale.

LAW_ENFORCEMENT.TITLE: Law Enforcement
LAW_ENFORCEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Under certain circumstances, the Company may be required to disclose Your Personal Data if required to do so by law or in response to valid requests by public authorities.

SECURITY.TITLE: Security of Your Personal Data
SECURITY.DESCRIPTION: The security of Your Personal Data is important to Us, but remember that no method of transmission over the Internet, or method of electronic storage, is 100% secure.

DATA_PROTECTION_RIGHTS.TITLE: Your Data Protection Rights
DATA_PROTECTION_RIGHTS.INTRO: Depending on Your location, You may have the following rights regarding Your Personal Data:
RIGHTS: The right to object to processing

CHILDRENS_PRIVACY.TITLE: Children's Privacy
CHILDRENS_PRIVACY.DESCRIPTION: Our Service is not intended for use by children under the age of 13. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 13.

CHANGES_TO_POLICY.TITLE: Changes to This Privacy Policy
CHANGES_TO_POLICY.DESCRIPTION: We may update Our Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify You of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page.
